pages.text: $(item)Garlic$() is a Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(thing)Garlic Seeds$().$(br)Mature garlic crops drop 1 to 5 garlics with no seeds. Bone Meal can be used on garlics.$(br)$(item)Garlics$() is the main ingredient in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes for dishes like $(item)Creamy Potato Pur√©e$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.
$(item)Garlic Seeds$() can be crafted by the $(item)Garlic$() in the Crafting Table.
